content: Hello Bitcointalk community member and Bitcoin art collector I am creating bitcoin art since 2017. This creation of art will speak for itself:) We all know....Collector‚Äôs Edition #3/3Video of my AR(Augmented Reality) Layer for physical artwork:https://streamable.com/e/rs2ifvPayment address: 3Lsy9r9CUf8MDVVAM6gb79urTECxvTFBKkAvailability:1.SOLD (--------------------) SOLD (3,500,000 sats) offer DECLINED ACCEPTED LOADABLE 2.SOLD (-------------------------------------------------------------)3. listed on the platform Raretoshi ------- AVAILABLE for 10,000,000 sats Each Collector‚Äôs Edition is hand-signed and numbered by Mx12.LevinsArtwork includes the L-NFT for physical piece minted via first Bitcoin focused NFT platform built on Liquid Network(Bitcoin sidechain)To claim the special/bonus edition, you will need to own 4 artworks: water, earth, fire and wind edition. This collection will work like a key for/to enter the Altar to claim the fifth artwork of these series.Details:Size: 45,9 x 60,9cmMaterial: Alu-Dibond-Finart GlossyGlossy lamination for protection against moisture, UV light, and scratches12-color printing process for stunning, high-quality resultsLimited edition of 3 piecesPayment:Payment address: 3Lsy9r9CUf8MDVVAM6gb79urTECxvTFBKkA REVOLUTIONARY LIFE SYSTEMThere is a saying "Through an Action, a Man becomes a Hero. Through Death, a Hero becomes Legend. Through Time, a Legend becomes Myth. Through hearing a Myth, a Man takes an Action.... "The universal hero emerged at a time when humanity seeks another hero to champion the next global revolution that everyone lunged for, to be set free from the slavery of the age.Our hero stepped into the scene knowing fully well what it will take to salvage humanity, it‚Äôs a great price that must be paid, that price is the death that translates heroes into the throne of legends.As the battles escalates and our hero fought with all his might and pushed back the long time wicked enemy soldiers of FIAT and Cheques, the battle was indeed legendary as the hero proved to the humanity of our time, that what they called impossible will only need time to manifest into the reality of endless possibilities.A dream come through for everyone in the universe as the hero pressed on from one region of existence to the other, from one network to another gradually breaking the camps of the enemy currency and rescuing many nations.But the death was inevitable as our great hero slowly started losing strength and the entire universe painfully watched as the hero gradually slide down and desperately gasped for LIFE, a life to live not for itself but for others, and just when it seems all hopes were lost, suddenly a great force emerged into the scene.No one has ever rescued humanity alone; every hero needs a helping hand at one point in their journey. Help stepped into the scene for our hero from a System that binds and supplies life to all the living (Water).Water came to the rescue and showered upon the hero, reviving him back to life and strengthening him to push on into the battlefield, as everyone cheered him on, victory is very close and our hero will never give up until the entire universe is reached and set free from the bondage that has held all captive for too long.Our Hero Has Found a New Friend to Carry Along into the Battle. Water is Life and as long as our hero has her, death will be conquered and our hero will live to see the day of Victory and Glory.Our Hero now has Life but needs strength and reinforcement (Power) to finish well. To be continued...This artwork is loadable and has attached opendime - the opendime address to load the artwork you will find via certificate! I choose opendime because of security reasons.Bitcointalk strong together ¬† ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîFeel Free to visit Mx12.Levins Bitcoin Art Threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5362071.0

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: The artwork in question is a revolutionary manifestation that marks the dawn of a new era. Its significance cannot be overstated, and I must express my thoughts on it to bring it to the forefront. The anonymous collector's praise from a few days ago filled me with joy and will continue to do so for a considerable time.Behind this artwork lies a crucial story that reminds me of Stirner's philosophy. The artwork embodies the spirit of individualism, and its creation represents a bold move towards self-realization. As Stirner once said, "Only he who is himself a master can be the master of others." This artwork is a testament to this truth, and I am thrilled to have experienced it.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: This is one of my favorite artworks so far, and I am still working on this series. The fourth artwork represents wind üå¨Ô∏è. Once you have obtained all four of these artworks, you will be able to receive the fifth element. These four artworks function as a key üîë that, when used, unlocks the fifth artwork. After this, the numbers will be out of play, leaving only three keys: three special fifth element artworks.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hi, numbers 1 and 3 BTC will be this month in London on August 22-23 at the private gallery of mx12art.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: The fourth element is now complete, bringing all four elements together. What's next? The fifth element is coming 100%, and the question is, will there be even more artworks beyond this fifth element?By the way, there's only one edition of the Water artwork left, and one is open for offers. To access the fifth element of Earth, you'll need to have all four artworks.And remember, while there's a 100% certainty of a fifth element, there might be even more artworks coming in this series, not just the hidden fifth element. These series will be very powerful ones. This is growing, and the only way to stop it is my death, but even after my passing, this will continue to flourish.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: The Water element was a lot of fun to create. Exploring life and envisioning the character's growth in the future made it a captivating experience. Being the first element, I believe these series hold the most powerful essence.I want to highlight the ongoing series because I'm currently collaborating on the fifth Element with my sensei. As a reminder, to unlock the special/bonus edition (fifth element), you'll need to possess the four artworks: water, earth, fire, and wind editions. This collection serves as the key to enter the Altar and claim the fifth artwork in the series.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Someone seized them all‚Äîthe entire Earth Elements series‚Äîat the Bitcoin Citadel in Germany! Enchanted by the fire, he was captivated by the series to such an extent that he acquired every piece and now eagerly anticipates the fifth element. With three fire, three water, and so forth, only three sets of the fifth element exist. With 2/3 water already sold, his acquisition of all the initial pieces means that only the complete 3/3 set remains to obtain the fifth element. Otherwise, collectors must trade or assemble the complete series to acquire this masterpiece. He resonated with the essence of these series, understanding the narrative, and now eagerly awaits the fifth element. It was a delight to provide him with these artworks, and I'm certain he'll share an image with all of them together. Thank you and congratulations.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: There is an update on the last event. A collector asked me to use a different frame, and I did it! Everything for my collectors. The fifth element will be going to his home as well, making him the first to collect all the elements with number 1.This edition also includes a loadable cold storage wallet with an amazing design, exclusive to the Citadel 2024 event, making the art even more unique. Thanks to the collector for the amazing pictures. Let's give him some love - the loadable address is in the thread for Water 1/3.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Tomorrow, and over the entire weekend, the last piece water, numbered 3/3 will be showcased at the event and possibly even sold. After that, there will be no way to acquire the water element directly, to complete the set of all four elements, you'll need to seek out the water element through a secondary sale. Currently, all four elements‚Äîwater, fire, earth, and wind‚Äîare still available as the third piece, numbered 3/3. People are undervaluing this series, but it's going to be huge and will make some waves in the future. The collector who purchased all four number 1/3 elements will receive the exclusive fifth element, numbered 1/3, tomorrow This is probably the last chance to get it, so I‚Äôm leaving the information here. Bitcointalk members should get in on these early, just letting you know. At the event, there will also be some artworks from my collectors on display, not for sale, and marked as sold. The collector wanted the artwork to travel.BTC Thank you,Bitcointalk community, friends

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Hey everyone,The time has come for the fifth element! I'll be posting about it soon in a special thread. To collect the fifth element, you need to have matching numbers from each of the previous elements I created. The collector who has all the 1/3 numbers is okay with sharing this with the community, but there are still some matching numbers left, specifically, all the 3/3s are still available.For the 2/3 elements, there's a bit of a challenge, you'll need to make offers to the collector through Scarce City, because the Water 2/3 was SOLD at the Bitcoin conference in Miami.So, the fifth element is out there, but the question is: what comes next? Where are the collectors, and why did the four elements awaken this mysterious figure? And who is he? Why does he have this particular color? This is just the very beginning of the series, the story starts now, and there's much more art to come. The Pandora's box is open!Thank you to the collectors and congratulations on acquiring these unique pieces. All of them are interactive, with integrated Bitcoin wallets Looking forward to sharing more soon! BTC
